ygData.subject: Pls explain AC
ygData.msgSnippet: I am not sure where anyone got the 15 weight is the best for monks...can someone please explain this...My AC does not change when i drop down to or below 15,
ygData.messageBody:
I am not sure where anyone got the 15 weight is the best for monks...can
someone please explain this...My AC does not change when i drop down to or
below 15, if anything it gets worse as I take my patchwork armor off. I
can't believe this nonsense about the super low weight unless you are
talking about encumbering weight. I know monks are suppose to use less than
others but I can't go on a huge hunting spree and not carry something back
to sell. Or should I be investing in items instead? Its a little hard to
invest in items on the PVP server since everyone is out to get you hehe.
Suggestions for eq would be most appriciated...where to buy cost? Thanks
Wutanj, asskicking PVP monk
lvl 8 (almost 9)
